main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Tarakli, Turkey, on December 29, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as bright smoke color and was at an altitude of 3,000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes., There was a short pursuit of the object before it was lost., Adverse weather conditions may have affected visibility., Turkish Air Force provided observations and reporting on similar sightings.
